DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not there was enough tissue to confirm the diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._Confirmed; having been established or verified._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Concepts.definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmed; having been established or verified.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, or Unknown to represent a condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had definitive surgical procedure leading to tissue for diagnosis?
